title: Hotpot with golden parsnips
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) dried black-eyed beans, soaked overnight', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '2 onions, sliced', '1 garlic clove, chopped', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) boneless leg of lamb, cut into 2.5 cm (1 in) cubes', '1 large aubergine, cubed', '115 g (4 oz) ready-to-eat dried apricots, quartered', '2 carrots, diced', '225 g (8 oz) turnips, diced', 'd tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 tsp ground coriander', '675 g (1½ lb) parsnips, thinly sliced', 'about 900 ml (1½ pints) vegetable stock, preferably home-made', 'salt and pepper', 'sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish']
